TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CLSCompliantAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CLSCompliantAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CLSCompliantAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示程序元素是否符合公共语言规范 (CLS)。

span.span: Indicates whether a program element is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性用于指示特定的程序元素是否符合与公共语言规范 (CLS)，用于定义面向.NET Framework 的任何语言都必须支持的功能。The attribute is used to indicate whether a particular program element complies with the Common Language Specification (CLS), which defines the features that any language that targets the .NET Framework must support. CLS 遵从性是主要的考虑因素对库的开发人员想要确保其库都可在任何面向.NET Framework 语言中访问。CLS compliance is primarily of concern to library developers who want to ensure that their libraries are accessible in any language that targets the .NET Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[语言独立性和与语言无关的组件](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md)。For more information, See [Language Independence and Language-Independent Components](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md). 您可以将应用以下程序元素的属性： 程序集、 模块、 类、 结构、 枚举、 构造函数、 方法、 属性、 字段、 事件、 接口、 委托、 参数和返回值。You can apply the attribute to the following program elements: assembly, module, class, struct, enum, constructor, method, property, field, event, interface, delegate, parameter, and return value. 但是，这一概念的 CLS 遵从性才有意义的程序集、 模块、 类型和成员类型，不包括成员签名的一部分。However, the notion of CLS compliance is only meaningful for assemblies, modules, types, and members of types, not parts of a member signature. 因此，时应用于参数或返回值的程序元素，将忽略。Consequently, is ignored when applied to parameter or return value program elements. 如果没有应用于程序元素，则默认情况下：If no is applied to a program element, then by default: - 程序集不符合 CLS 規格。The assembly is not CLS-compliant. - 仅当其封闭类型或程序集不符合 cls 的类型为符合 CLS 規格。The type is CLS-compliant only if its enclosing type or assembly is CLS-compliant. - 仅当类型为符合 cls 的成员是类型的符合 CLS 規格。The member of a type is CLS-compliant only if the type is CLS-compliant. 如果程序集标记为符合 CLS 規格，必须使用标记中不符合 cls 的程序集的任何公开的类型使用`false`参数。If an assembly is marked as CLS-compliant, any publicly exposed type in the assembly that is not CLS-compliant must be marked with using a `false` argument. 同样，如果一个类标记为符合 CLS 規格，则必须单独标记不符合 CLS 規格的所有成员。Similarly, if a class is marked as CLS-compliant, you must individually mark all members that are not CLS-compliant. 不符合标准的所有成员必须都提供相应的符合 cls 的替代项。All non-compliant members must provide corresponding CLS-compliant alternatives. 应用于程序集或模块的属性必须出现在 C# 后`using`(`Imports`在 Visual Basic 中) 子句和代码的前面。Attributes that are applied to assemblies or modules must occur after the C# `using` (`Imports` in Visual Basic) clauses and before the code. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 当前的 Microsoft Visual Basic 编译器有意不会生成 CLS 遵从性警告，但是，将来的版本的编译器将发出警告。The current Microsoft Visual Basic compiler intentionally does not generate a CLS-compliance warning, however, a future release of the compiler will issue that warning. ## Examples 下面的示例应用到整个程序集。The following example applies a to the entire assembly. ```csharp using System; [assembly: CLSCompliant(true)] ``` 下面的声明生成 CLS 遵从性警告，因为类型`UInt32`CLS 中未指定。The following declaration generates a CLS-compliance warning because the type `UInt32` is not specified in the CLS. ```csharp public int SetValue(UInt32 value); ``` 如果声明标记有，生成编译器警告或错误。If the declaration is marked with a , no compiler warning or error is generated. ```csharp [CLSCompliant(false)] public int SetValue(UInt32 value); ```

param.span: 如果程序元素符合 CLS，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with a Boolean value indicating whether the indicated program element is CLS-compliant.

public: property bool IsCompliant { bool get(); };

span.span: Gets the Boolean value indicating whether the indicated program element is CLS-compliant.

value.span: 如果程序元素符合 CLS，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the program element is CLS-compliant; otherwise, .
